item.title: Navigating an API from the terminal
item.description: Today, we'll be diving into The Movie Database with HTTPie, jq, and jid and learning how to navigate its API efficiently.

item.title: Command-line API testing tricks
item.description: Whether building or consuming APIs, you're definitely testing out API calls. The command line is a developer's best friend for quick checks and iterative development.
item.content:encoded: Whether building or consuming APIs, you're definitely testing out API calls. The command line is a developer's best friend for quick checks and iterative development.
